solution_line_template: Start by figuring the number of pounds Baxter bought. ${total_spent} / ${cost_per_pound} per pound = <<{total_spent}/{cost_per_pound}={pounds_bought}>>{pounds_bought} pounds of peanuts
{pounds_bought} pounds bought - {minimum_pounds} pounds minimum = <<{pounds_bought}-{minimum_pounds}={pounds_over_minimum}>>{pounds_over_minimum} pounds over.
